title: 第 5 集 捉迷藏 | Hide and seek

data.en: Hide and seek

data.zh: 佩奇和乔治在玩捉迷藏。
data.en: Peppa and George are playing hide and seek.
It is George's turn to hide.

data.zh: 他必须要在佩奇数完数前赶快找地方藏起来。
data.en: He must quickly find somewhere to hide before Peppa finishes counting!
One... two... three...
four... five... six... seven...

data.zh: 乔治正好及时找到地方藏起来了。 八。。。九。。。
data.en: George has found somewhere to hide, eight... just in time! nine...
ten...
Ready or not. here I come!

data.zh: 佩奇要找到乔治藏在哪。
data.en: Peppa has to find where George is hiding.
Found you!
Peppa has found George.

data.zh: 乔治，我很容易就看到你了。
data.en: George, I could see you too easily.
Now it is Peppa's turn to hide.
One... erm... three.
I'll help George to count.
One... two... three...four... five...
six... seven... eight... nine... ten!

data.zh: 好了，乔治，挣开你的眼睛吧！
data.en: Okay, George, open your eyes!

data.zh: 乔治要找到佩奇藏在哪。
data.en: George has to find where Peppa is hiding.
Oh.
Peppa isn't hiding under the table.

data.zh: 乔治，你有没有想过上楼上看看？
data.en: George, have you thought of looking upstairs?

data.zh: 佩奇也没有藏在床底下。
data.en: Peppa isn't under the bed.
What was that strange noise?

data.zh: 佩奇也没有藏在窗帘后。
data.en: Peppa isn't behind the curtain.
There is that strange noise again!
What can it be?
Whee !

data.zh: 乔治找到佩奇藏在哪了。
data.en: George has found where Peppa was hiding.
George found me!
Now it's Daddy's turn to hide!

data.zh: 哦，我想乔治应该再藏一次。
data.en: Oh, I think George should have another turn.
But George isn't very good at hiding...

data.zh: 我相信他这次会藏得很好的。
data.en: I'm sure he'll be better this time.

data.zh: 闭上你的眼睛开始数吧。
data.en: Close your eyes and start counting.
One... two...

data.zh: 三。。。哦，糟糕。佩奇会很容易找到乔治的。四。。。
data.en: three... Oh, dear. Peppa will easily find George. four...
five...
six... George! Come over here... seven...
eight... nine... ten!
Ready or not, here I come!

data.zh: 哦，乔治没有藏在桌底下！
data.en: Oh, George isn't hiding under the table!

data.zh: 但是乔治以前总藏在桌底下的！
data.en: But George always hides under the table!

data.zh: 你有没有想过看看楼上呢？
data.en: Have you thought of looking upstairs?
I know where he is!

data.zh: 乔治肯定藏在玩具篮里。
data.en: George is in the toy basket.
Oh.

data.zh: 乔治没有藏到玩具篮里！
data.en: George is not in the toy basket!
Where can he be?
Peppa can not find George anywhere.
Daddy? I can't find George anywhere.

data.zh: 哦，这样啊，我很想知道他会藏到哪。
data.en: Oh, dear, I wonder where he can be.

data.zh: 事实上，我想报纸上有些关于乔治的消息。。。
data.en: Actually, I think there's something about George in this newspaper...
Whee...
George! Found you!
Oh, George!

data.zh: 那真是一个捉迷藏的好地方！
data.en: That was a good place to hide!

data.zh: 原来乔治一真藏在猪爸爸的报纸后面！
data.en: George was hiding behind Daddy Pig's newspaper all the time!
